professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in database migration, recovery, and administration. Proficient in Oracle 9i to 12c environments, RMAN, TTS, and database security. Strong skills in applying security patches, performance tuning, and 24x7 production support.

key_responsibilities: Cloned/migrated databases using RMAN and traditional tools.
Implemented recovery strategies and successfully recovered databases in case of crashes or media failures.
Scheduled physical backups (hot & cold) using RMAN and monitored scheduled jobs.

Maintained data integrity and security using constraints and triggers.
Provided 24x7 support for production and development databases.
